answers.answer: I'll be 22 weeks tomorrow btw, and I know most ppl don't take the glucose test until around 24-28 weeks.

question: I just came back from my appt and I had sugar in my urine. They checked my blood sugar and it was 167, and it shouldn't be over 140. So now I have to take the glucose test tomorrow morning. If I have gestational diabetes I'm just going to cry. I don't want to havr anything that could harm myself or my baby boy. I just pray everything comes out negative. Any moms ever development gestational diabetes?
title: Might have Gestational Diabetes :(
